title: Topology of the closed unit interval

blocks.name: unitsscn
blocks.content: The closed unit interval is a subset of the set of the complex numbers. Useful lemma for manipulating probabilities within the closed unit interval. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: elunitrn
blocks.content: The closed unit interval is a subset of the set of the real numbers. Useful lemma for manipulating probabilities within the closed unit interval. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: elunitcn
blocks.content: The closed unit interval is a subset of the set of the complext numbers. Useful lemma for manipulating probabilities within the closed unit interval. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: elunitge0
blocks.content: An element of the closed unit interval is positive. Useful lemma for manipulating probabilities within the closed unit interval. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: unitssxrge0
blocks.content: The closed unit interval is a subset of the set of the extended nonnegative reals. Useful lemma for manipulating probabilities within the closed unit interval. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm unitssxrge0() {
  |- wss(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
} = {
  mp2an(wss(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(nat1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  0e0iccpnf()
  mpbir3an(wcel(nat1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(nat1, cxr), wbr(nat0, cle, nat1), wbr(nat1, cle, cpnf))
  0le1()
  ax-mp(wbr(nat1, cle, cpnf), wcel(nat1, cxr))
  1xr()
  pnfge(nat1)
  mp2an(wb(wcel(nat1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), w3a(wcel(nat1, cxr), wbr(nat0, cle, nat1), wbr(nat1, cle, cpnf))), wcel(nat0, cxr), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  0xr()
  pnfxr()
  elicc1(nat0, cpnf, nat1)
  iccss2(nat0, nat0, cpnf, nat1)
}

blocks.name: unitdivcld
blocks.content: Necessary conditions for a quotient to be in the closed unit interval. (somewhat too strong, it would be sufficient that A and B are in RR+) (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm unitdivcld(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wne(c1, nat0)), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), co(nat0, cicc, nat1))))
} = {
  syl6bbr(w3a(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wne(c1, nat0)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), w3a(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cdiv, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cle, nat1)))
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wne(c1, nat0)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), w3a(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cdiv, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cle, nat1)))
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wne(c1, nat0)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), w3a(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cdiv, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cle, nat1)))
  3jca(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wne(c1, nat0)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cdiv, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cle, nat1))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wne(c1, nat0)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr))
  redivcld(c0, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wne(c1, nat0)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wne(c1, nat0))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wne(c1, nat0)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cdiv, c1)))
  syl22anc(w3a(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wne(c1, nat0)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cdiv, c1)), wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wne(c1, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  elunitge0(c0)
  divge0(c0, c1)
  biimpa(w3a(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wne(c1, nat0)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cle, nat1))
  syl5ibr(w3a(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wne(c1, nat0)), w3a(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cdiv, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cle, nat1)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cle, nat1))
  simp3(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cdiv, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cle, nat1))
  bitr2d(w3a(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wne(c1, nat0)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cle, nat1), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, cmul, nat1)))
  syl112anc(w3a(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wne(c1, nat0)), wb(wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cle, nat1), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, cmul, nat1))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(nat1, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wne(c1, nat0), wcel(c0, cr))
  elunitrn(c0)
  1red(w3a(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wne(c1, nat0)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wne(c1, nat0), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))
  mpd3an3(wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wne(c1, nat0), wbr(nat0, clt, c1), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))
  adantr(wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wne(c1, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))
  elunitge0(c1)
  3com23(wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wne(c1, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))
  3impb(wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wne(c1, nat0), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))
  biimpar(wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wne(c1, nat0)), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))
  sylancr(wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wb(wbr(nat0, clt, c1), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wne(c1, nat0))), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  0re()
  ltlen(nat0, c1)
  ledivmul(c0, nat1, c1)
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wne(c1, nat0)), wb(wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, cmul, nat1)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wcel(c1, cr))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wne(c1, nat0), wcel(c1, cr))
  elunitrn(c1)
  breq2d(c0, cle, co(c1, cmul, nat1), c1, wcel(c1, cr))
  ax-1rid(c1)
  elicc01(co(c0, cdiv, c1))
}

blocks.name: iistmd
blocks.content: The closed unit interval forms a topological monoid under multiplication. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Mar-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm iistmd(class c0) {
  |- wcel(c0, ctmd)
  -| wceq(c0, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
} = {
  mp2an(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), ctmd), wcel(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))))
  mp2b(wcel(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), ctmd), wcel(ccnfld, cnrg), wcel(ccnfld, ctrg))
  nrgtrg(ccnfld)
  trgtmd(ccnfld, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))
  mpbir3an(wcel(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))), wss(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cc), wcel(nat1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wral(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), wral(hs1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))))
  unitsscn()
  1elunit()
  rgen2a(hs0, hs1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
  iimulcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))), w3a(wss(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cc), wcel(nat1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wral(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), wral(hs1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))))), wcel(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cmnd))
  mp2b(wcel(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cmnd), wcel(ccnfld, cnrg), wcel(ccnfld, crg))
  cnnrg()
  nrgring(ccnfld)
  ringmgp(ccnfld, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))
  issubm(hs0, hs1, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cc, nat1, cmul)
  mgpbas(cc, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), ccnfld)
  cnfldbas()
  ringidval(nat1, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), ccnfld)
  cnfld1()
  mgpplusg(cmul, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), ccnfld)
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))
  cnfldmul()
  submtmd(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c0)
  diff.hs1.c(co(nat0, cicc, nat1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat0, cicc, nat1))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iistmd(class c0) {
  ⊢ c0 ∈ TopMnd
  ⊣ c0 =((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s](0[[,]]1))
} = {
  mp2an(c0 ∈ TopMnd, (mulGrp ` CCfld)∈ TopMnd, (0[[,]]1)∈(SubMnd `(mulGrp ` CCfld)))
  mp2b((mulGrp ` CCfld)∈ TopMnd, CCfld ∈ NrmRing, CCfld ∈ TopRing)
  nrgtrg(ccnfld)
  trgtmd(ccnfld, (mulGrp ` CCfld))
  mpbir3an((0[[,]]1)∈(SubMnd `(mulGrp ` CCfld)), (0[[,]]1)⊆ ℂ, 1 ∈(0[[,]]1), ∀(hs0 ∈(0[[,]]1), ∀(hs1 ∈(0[[,]]1),(hs0[×]hs1)∈(0[[,]]1))))
  unitsscn()
  1elunit()
  rgen2a(hs0, hs1, (0[[,]]1), (hs0[×]hs1)∈(0[[,]]1))
  iimulcl(hs0, hs1)
  ax-mp(((0[[,]]1)∈(SubMnd `(mulGrp ` CCfld))↔((0[[,]]1)⊆ ℂ ∧ 1 ∈(0[[,]]1)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈(0[[,]]1), ∀(hs1 ∈(0[[,]]1),(hs0[×]hs1)∈(0[[,]]1))))), (mulGrp ` CCfld)∈ Mnd)
  mp2b((mulGrp ` CCfld)∈ Mnd, CCfld ∈ NrmRing, CCfld ∈ Ring)
  cnnrg()
  nrgring(ccnfld)
  ringmgp(ccnfld, (mulGrp ` CCfld))
  issubm(hs0, hs1, (mulGrp ` CCfld), (0[[,]]1), cc, nat1, cmul)
  mgpbas(cc, (mulGrp ` CCfld), ccnfld)
  cnfldbas()
  ringidval(nat1, (mulGrp ` CCfld), ccnfld)
  cnfld1()
  mgpplusg(cmul, (mulGrp ` CCfld), ccnfld)
  eqid((mulGrp ` CCfld))
  cnfldmul()
  submtmd((mulGrp ` CCfld), (0[[,]]1), c0)
  diff.hs1.c((0[[,]]1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c((mulGrp ` CCfld))
  diff.hs0.c((0[[,]]1))
  diff.hs1.c((mulGrp ` CCfld))
}
